name: Captain Comic: The Adventure
summary: Captain Comic: The Adventure is a classic 1988 MS-DOS platform game which is known for being one of the first side-scrolling games made for IBM PC. It was developed entirely by Michael Denio. The PC version of the game was distributed as shareware. Later a version for the NES was published by Color Dreams as an unlicensed title. An unofficial conversion for the SAM Coupé also exists. It was also cloned as "The Adventures of Pioneer Ksenia" in 1990 by a team of Ukrainian programmers. Gameplay of Captain Comic: In the game, the player takes control of Captain Comic who is on a mission to the planet Tambi to recover three treasures stolen from the planet Omsoc.
